name: ListAssistant
0:
”alexa, ask list assistant to email my shopping list”
”alexa, ask list assistant to email my todo list”
”alexa, ask list assistant email my shopping list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: list assistant
des:
List assistant can help you email all your items in shopping or todo list.

Don't worry about internet in costco store or whole foods store, just ask List assistant to email your shopping or todo lists and keep them handy in your email.
